# tslint-config-egg

Typescript Style Guide for Egg.

## Install

```bash
npm i tslint tslint-config-egg --save-dev
```

## Usage

- `package.json`

```json
{
  "devDependencies": {
    "tslint-config-egg": "1",
    "tslint": "5"
  }
}
```

- `tslint.json`

```js
{
  "extends": "tslint-config-egg"
}
```
